title: Electricity (Common Carrier) (Declaration) Regulations, 2021
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 77
Gazette dated Friday, 9th April, 2021
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 24 of 2021
The Electricity Act, 2019
(Act No. 11 of 2019)
The Electricity (Common Carrier) (Declaration)
Regulations, 2021
IN EXCERCISE of the powers contained in section 15 of the
Electricity Act, 2019, the following Regulations are made:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Electricity (Common Title
Carrier) (Declaration) Regulations, 2021.
2. The transmission and distribution lines set out in the Schedule Declaration
are declared as a common carrier for the purposes of the Act. of common
carrier
3. The Electricity (Common Carrier) (Declaration) Revocation
Regulations, 2020, are revoked. of SI No.
57of 2020
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K8.00 each.
78 Statutory Instruments 9th April, 2021

(Regulation 2)
